item.title: O
item.description: score:351 Chances: With the Fed’s accommodative approach and favorable market fundamentals, REITs like EQIX, O, EGP and STAG seem well-poised to excel in 2024. A combination of high yields and the strong likelihood of dividend raises in the future make these compelling stocks ready to buy now.
